title: Mozilla Firefox 121 Is Now Available for Download, Here’s What’s New
description:
Firefox 121 open-source web browser is now available for download with Wayland support enabled by default on Linux, improved PDF editing, and other changes.

The post Mozilla Firefox 121 Is Now Available for Download, Here’s What’s New appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: postmarketOS 23.12 Brings the GNOME 45 Desktop to Linux Phones and Tablets
description:
postmarketOS 23.12 operating system is now available for download based on Alpine Linux 3.19 and featuring the GNOME Shell on Mobile 45 desktop environment, as well as support for new devices.

The post postmarketOS 23.12 Brings the GNOME 45 Desktop to Linux Phones and Tablets appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
